Name: CityBeat: The Sorority Shuffle
About the game: What started as just another day at City Beat Magazine turns into the opportunity youâ€™ve been looking for. Tasked by the chief editor of the Scandals Section, you must put your wits and cunning to work to break a story about sex, secrets, and corruption. Do you have the chops to uncover the truth? Requires Chrome/Chromium >= 70 to be installed. Features Explore maps and collect items Interact with characters to get useful information Old-school text game mechanics Great artwork including some with very mature themes Modern UI Walkthrough and hi-res art gallery Note CityBeat: The Sorority Shuffle i s an Adult Interactive Fiction game, you have to type commands to move around and interact with objects and characters. Demo Demo has all the same content and doesn't differ from the 'full game', except: Achievements Art gallery Walkthrough So you don't really need to buy the game to play it, only to support us. Requires Chrome/Chromium >= 70 to be installed.
